explanation: Agent A is correct. The for statement is written as for (i = 0; i < len; ++i) (i is the loop counter) but the loop body contains several ++i and a ++i in an else branch. MISRA C 2023 Rule 14.2 requires that the loop counter shall not be modified in the for-loop body (and there shall be only one loop counter). Modifying i inside the loop body therefore violates Rule 14.2.
